title: Kyrus Recycling
description: A web application incentivizing users to recycle waste by offering monetary rewards, promoting environmental sustainability.
challenges: Encouraging user engagement and sign-ups for a niche recycling incentive program.
Building a scalable web application within a strict three-month timeline.
Ensuring seamless collaboration and deployment while maintaining a high user experience.
solutions: Designed and developed a full-stack web application with React and Node.js, ensuring efficiency and scalability.
Implemented a responsive, user-friendly interface to maximize accessibility and engagement.
Developed a robust backend system for tracking recycling activities and rewarding users.
outcomes: Successfully launched within three months, attracting over 500 user sign-ups in the first month and contributing to greater environmental awareness and waste recycling efforts.

title: Welup Digital
description: Implemented high-impact SEO and web development strategies to boost traffic, improve engagement, and optimize web performance.
challenges: Enhancing website traffic and search engine visibility.
Optimizing for Core Web Vitals and ensuring fast load times.
Implementing SEO-friendly content while maintaining great UX.
solutions: Executed an SEO strategy that increased website traffic by 300% and improved search engine rankings significantly.
Conducted keyword research and competitive analysis, identifying over 200 high-value keywords.
Created and published multiple top-ranking blogs, generating over 20,000 monthly visitors.
outcomes: Achieved a 15-fold increase in search visibility, improved user engagement by 40%, and boosted CTR by 25% within six months.

title: Prompt Earn
description: Executed a data-driven SEO and affiliate marketing campaign that significantly boosted website traffic and sales revenue.
challenges: Expanding the affiliate network and increasing organic search visibility.
Optimizing Google Core Web Vitals to enhance performance.
Reducing bounce rates and improving engagement for better conversions.
solutions: Implemented an SEO campaign that increased organic traffic by 250% within six months.
Expanded the affiliate network from 40,000 to over 93,000 partners, driving a 132% increase in referral traffic.
Optimized Core Web Vitals, achieving a 35-point improvement and reducing bounce rates by 50%.
outcomes: Resulted in a 45% revenue uplift, significant search engine ranking improvements, and an overall increase in platform engagement.
